post.text: Today once again proved that the system is absolutely rigged. How Crooked Hillary got away with sharing TOP SECRET emails and LYING about it is just absolutely unbelievable! Crooked Hillary should be prosecuted, not running for President! #CrookedHillary #RiggedSystem

comment.author: Kathryn
comment.text: Kelsey , see what I mean? Sec of state lying? How about her aide's ties to the Muslim world league and Saudi arabia? How about said aides mother supporting sharia law? 20% of Hillary's campaign finances came directly from Saudi. Does that seem ok to you? People talk about putin and trump...what about Hillary and Omar naseef?!

replies.author: Kelsey
replies.text: All politicians lie, no candidate is running a 100% honest campaign

replies.author: Kathryn
replies.text: True story. The question is where to assign value to truths, behavior, intent, etc. Bad actions do not cancel out good ones, and each person should be judged on the merit of all their actions.

replies.author: Kathryn
replies.text: For the record, I would've voted for Bernie. I think there's a way to success on the left, and on the right. While different paths they both end with prosperous america. I do not believe hillary can take us down that path.

replies.author: Kelsey
replies.text: Agreed, which is why I still support Hillary. Definitely don't believe she is flawless, but she does have experience is the political arena. Just like when I go to the doctor, I judge them on their ability to do their job, not with their outside scandals/affairs.
